a toggle axes helper
c switch camera
e toggle effects
f toggle stats (fps)
g toggle GUI
i toggle info panel
l toggle labels
o toggle sun light (DirectionalLight)
p toggle camera light (PointLight)
r render
s toggle shadows
dblclick/tap reload
cmd/ctrl+s save png
cmd/ctrl+d save obj
< back to previous hash
> forward to next hash
? reload current hash
| remove hash from url
space toggle animate
shift+c toggle shadow camera helper
